nav.div: Allentown School District » Employees » COVID19 Employee Updates

div.span:
Retirement and 403B Information
Typically we would receive this information and distribute this printed material to all of you through your individual buildings. Due to COVID - 19 we will not be receiving printed material.
Download: TSA Annual Retirement Benefits Guide
Download: Meaningful Notice / Plan Summary Information 2020
Employee Assistant Plan: Download EAP Brochure
The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA)
The FFCRA requires certain employers to provide their employees with paid sick leave or expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19. The Department of Labor’s Wage and Hour Division (WHD) administers and enforces the new law’s paid leave requirements. These provisions will apply from the effective date through December 31, 2020.
Learn more about FFCRA.

span.br:
Teledentistry assessments are covered for United Concordia commercial members. Coverage levels are subject to plan terms and conditions. More Information about Teledentistry.
March 26, 2020: School Law Bullet Update from King, Spry, Herman, Freund, & Faul, LLC., Education Law Practice
